meanings.definition: A person who is honored or awarded a prize or recognition.
meanings.sent1: The honoree received a medal for being the best student in the class.
meanings.sent2: The school's honoree for the year was announced at the assembly.
meanings.sent3: At the ceremony, the honoree blushed with pride as the audience applauded.
meanings.sent4: Being named the honoree was like winning a golden ticket to success.
meanings.sent5: The honoree's face lit up with joy as they accepted the prestigious award.

meanings.definition: The recipient of an honor or award.
meanings.sent1: Every year, the honoree of the community service award is celebrated at a special event.
meanings.sent2: The honoree of the scholarship was grateful for the opportunity to further their education.
meanings.sent3: The honoree's acceptance speech was filled with heartfelt gratitude and humility.
meanings.sent4: Becoming the honoree was a dream come true for the dedicated volunteer.
meanings.sent5: The honoree's name will forever be engraved on the trophy as a symbol of their achievement.
